Dec. 27, 1930 D Neath Contest (Class B)

neath-contest-class-b
None
Gwyn Hall, Neath, Neath Port Talbot, Wales UK
3rd and 4th divided between Cwmavon and Llansaint.
4 bands competed.
Organised by the West Wales Band Association.
May 19, 2012, 7:05 a.m. Nov. 24, 2015, 6:18 a.m.
